Interface SpaceObject

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ControlledObject, FallingObject, SimpleSpaceObject, SpaceObjectDecorator, SpinningObject

    public interface SpaceObject
    Describes the fundamental behavior of a SpaceObject. Obviously, there are no implementation details here. Our design assumes that a SpaceObject 'floats' in two-dimensional space.
    Author:
    sdexter72

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void collide(SpaceObject obj)
      Deal with a collision with another object
      Polygon getPoly()
      Returns the Polygon shape which is used to check for collide
      void move(int x, int y)
      Move the SpaceObject in space
      void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Paint the SpaceObject on a suitable component
      void rotate(double r)
      Rotate the SpaceObject in space

    • Method Detail

      • move

        void move(int x,
        int y)
        Move the SpaceObject in space
        Parameters:
        x - number of pixels to move horizontally (positive=rightward)
        y - number of pixels to move vertically (positive=downward)

      • rotate

        void rotate(double r)
        Rotate the SpaceObject in space
        Parameters:
        r - number or degrees to rotate (positive=clockwise)
